Accelerators,

You can read up on our last month of PSA activities in our April newsletter (https://psysciacc.org/news/2019-04-30_news-from-the-accelerator-april-2019.html) .

It includes updates on all 6 of our current studies and several of our grant applications.

Thank you for all of your continued work on the PSA! Let us know if you have any questions or concerns about the PSA or any of our projects.
